name: King of the Trash
description:
This game was made by Totema Studio and  friends with a team of 6 in only 48 hours.

We made this game during the WonderJam 2019 at the University of Quebec at Chicoutimi.

At Totema Studio, we specialize in local multiplayer games. Here comes another one!

Join our Patreon if you are interested in more games!

Theme

  • Climatic Catrastophe in 2119: When the end of the world is near

Styles

  • Arcade
  • Multiplayer
  • Dialogue (discarded)

Game details

King of the Trash is a 2-player versus arcade game where you play as rich capitalists trying to save their live from the flood over a huge pile of trash. Don't fall in the deadly waters! Throw trash at your opponent to put him off balance and jump your way up the junkyard for victory. 

Special notes for initial build

It is a windows only version that was built for the universit's Arcade. We will submit a different version which allows playing with keyboards and controllers. If you want to play the initial version, you must use Xbox360 or Xbox One controllers.

Controls (xbox):

* (B) Jump
* (Y) Trash
* (Left Joystick) Move and aim!

Team

  • Gabriel Le Breton
  • Samuel Taillon
  • François Dessureault
  • Francis Renaud
  • Raphaël Côté
  • Jérôme Chaîney
